sn35.10:3.1: 10. Bāhirāniccātītānāgatasutta
sn35.10:4.3: Evaṃ passaṃ, bhikkhave, sutavā ariyasāvako atītesu rūpesu anapekkho hoti;
sn35.10:4.5: paccuppannānaṃ rūpānaṃ nibbidāya virāgāya nirodhāya paṭipanno hoti.
sn35.10:4.12: Evaṃ passaṃ, bhikkhave, sutavā ariyasāvako atītesu dhammesu anapekkho hoti;
sn35.10:4.14: paccuppannānaṃ dhammānaṃ nibbidāya virāgāya nirodhāya paṭipanno hotī”ti.
